==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|かい|けつ|yomi=on}}

===Etymology===
[[解]] (かい, ''kai'': “solution”) + [[決]] (けつ, ''ketsu'': “decisive”)

===Pronunciation===
* {{ja-pron|かいけつ|y=o|acc=0|acc_ref=NHK}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|かいけつ}}

# a [[conclusion]] to a problem, [[solution]]
# {{lb|ja|music|sort=かいけつ}} [[progression|Progression]] from [[dissonance]] to [[consonance]]; a chord to which such progression is made; [[resolution]]

====Antonyms====
* {{sense|solution}} {{ja-r|対立|たいりつ}}

====Compounds====
* {{ja-r|問題解決|もんだい かいけつ}}: [[solve|solving]] [[problem]]
* {{ja-r|解決方法|かいけつ ほうほう}}: [[solution]]
* {{ja-r|解決手段|かいけつ しゅだん}}: [[means]] of [[solution]]

===Verb===
{{ja-verb-suru|tr=both|かいけつ}}

# to [[resolve]] (''a problem, a trouble, a criminal case'')
#: {{ja-usex|彼らはその問題を１日で'''解決した'''。|^かれら は その もんだい を いちにち で '''かいけつ した'''。|They '''resolved''' the problem in a day.}}
#: {{ja-usex|問題は'''解決した'''。|^もんだい は '''かいけつ した'''。|The problem '''was resolved'''.}}

====Conjugation====
{{ja-suru|かいけつ}}
